thoughts.text: I found a website called 'Instituto Hemingway' that offers an online Spanish writing course. I think I should check it out and see if it meets my needs.
thoughts.reasoning: I found a website called 'Instituto Hemingway' that offers an online Spanish writing course. It seems like it could be a good resource for practicing writing in Spanish, so it makes sense to check it out and see if it meets my needs.
thoughts.plan:
- Browse the 'Instituto Hemingway' website to learn more about their online Spanish writing course
- Consider signing up for the course if it meets my needs
- Practice speaking and writing in Spanish consistently
thoughts.criticism: I need to make sure I am practicing consistently and getting feedback on my language skills.
thoughts.speak: I found a website called 'Instituto Hemingway' that offers an online Spanish writing course. I think I should check it out and see if it meets my needs.

args.question: What are the details of the online Spanish writing course offered by Instituto Hemingway?
